se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Class ProposerStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.mcmc.ProposerStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FineProposerStatistics

    public class ProposerStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements InfoProvider
    Base class for statistics of Proposer objects (and potentially others) with respect to acceptance and rejection. If desired, one may increment the acceptance/rejections counter by also providing a string key for a specific sub-category that should be monitored.

    See also FineProposerStatistics.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
